title: com.apple.applicationaccess
description: The payload for configuring restrictions on a device.

enforcedSoftwareUpdateNonOSDeferredInsta.title: Enforced Software Update Non OS Deferred Install Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateNonOSDeferredInsta.description: This restriction allows the admin to set how many days to delay an app software update on the device. When this restriction is in place the user sees a non-OS software update only after the specified delay after the release of the software. This value controls the delay for forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates. Available in macOS 11.3 and later.

allowSpotlightInternetResults.title: Allow Spotlight Internet Results
allowSpotlightInternetResults.description: If false, disables Spotlight Internet search results in Siri Suggestions. Available in macOS 10.11 and later. Default: true

enforcedSoftwareUpdateMinorOSDeferredIns.title: Enforced Software Update Minor OS Deferred Install Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateMinorOSDeferredIns.description: This restriction allows the admin to set how many days to delay a minor OS software update on the device. When this restriction is in place the user see a software update only after the specified delay after the release of the software update. This value controls the delay for forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates. Available in macOS 11.3 and later.

allowRemoteScreenObservation.title: Allow Remote Screen Observation
allowRemoteScreenObservation.description: If false, disables remote screen observation by the Classroom app. Nest this key beneath allowScreenShot as a subrestriction. If allowScreenShot is set to false, the Classroom app doesn't observe remote screens. Required a supervised device until macOS 10.15. Available in macOS 10.14.4 and later. Default: true

allowAirDrop.title: Allow Air Drop
allowAirDrop.description: If false, disables AirDrop. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: true

forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates.title: Force Delayed Software Updates
forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates.description: If true, delays user visibility of software updates. In macOS, seed build updates are allowed, without delay The delay is 30 days unless enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay is set to another value. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: false.

allowCloudReminders.title: Allow Cloud Reminders
allowCloudReminders.description: If false, disables iCloud Reminder services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

allowCloudMail.title: Allow Cloud Mail
allowCloudMail.description: If false, disables iCloud Mail services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

forceClassroomUnpromptedAppAndDeviceLock.title: Force Classroom Unprompted AppA nd Device Lock
forceClassroomUnpromptedAppAndDeviceLock.description: If true, allows the teacher to lock apps or the device without prompting the student. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.14.4 and later. Default: false

allowDictation.title: Allow Dictation
allowDictation.description: If false, disallows dictation input. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: true

allowAutoUnlock.title: Allow Auto Unlock
allowAutoUnlock.description: If false, disallows auto unlock. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

allowWallpaperModification.title: Allow Wallpaper Modification
allowWallpaperModification.description: If false, prevents wallpaper from being changed. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: True

forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservatio.title: Force Classroom Unprompted Screen Observation
forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservatio.description: If true and ScreenObservationPermissionModificationAllowed is also true in the Education payload, a student enrolled in a managed course via the Classroom app automatically gives permission to that course teacher's requests to observe the student's screen without prompting the student. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.14.4 and later. Default: false

forceClassroomRequestPermissionToLeaveCl.title: Force Classroom Request Permission To Leave Classes
forceClassroomRequestPermissionToLeaveCl.description: If true, a student enrolled in an unmanaged course through Classroom requests permission from the teacher when attempting to leave the course. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.14.4 and later. Default: false

allowPasswordSharing.title: Allow Password Sharing
allowPasswordSharing.description: If false, disables sharing passwords with the Airdrop Passwords feature. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.14 and later. Default: true

allowCamera.title: Allow Camera
allowCamera.description: If false, disables the camera, and its icon is removed from the Home screen. Users are unable to take photographs. This restriction is deprecated on unsupervised devices and will be supervised only in a future release.  Available in macOS 10.11 and later. Default: true

allowFingerprintForUnlock.title: Allow Finger print For Unlock
allowFingerprintForUnlock.description: If false, prevents Touch ID or Face ID from unlocking a device. Available in macOS 10.12.4 and later. Default: true

allowActivityContinuation.title: Allow Activity Continuation
allowActivityContinuation.description: If false, disables activity continuation. Available in macOS 10.15 and later. Default: true

forceClassroomAutomaticallyJoinClasses.title: Force ClassroomA utomatically Join Classes
forceClassroomAutomaticallyJoinClasses.description: If true, automatically gives permission to the teacher's requests without prompting the student. Requires a supervised device. Available in and macOS 10.14.4 and later. Default: false

allowCloudPhotoLibrary.title: Allow Cloud Photo Library
allowCloudPhotoLibrary.description: If false, disables iCloud Photo Library. Any photos not fully downloaded from iCloud Photo Library to the device are removed from local storage. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

allowDiagnosticSubmission.title: Allow Diagnostic Submission
allowDiagnosticSubmission.description: If false, prevents the device from automatically submitting diagnostic reports to Apple. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Also available for user enrollment. Default: true

allowCloudAddressBook.title: Allow Cloud AddressBook
allowCloudAddressBook.description: If false, disables iCloud Address Book services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

allowPasscodeModification.title: Allow Passcode Modification
allowPasscodeModification.description: If false, prevents the device passcode from being added, changed, or removed. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: True

enforcedFingerprintTimeout.title: Enforced Fingerprint Timeout
enforcedFingerprintTimeout.description: The value, in seconds, after which the fingerprint unlock will require a password to authenticate. The default value is 48 hours. Default: 172800

allowCloudCalendar.title: Allow Cloud Calendar
allowCloudCalendar.description: If false, disables iCloud Calendar services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

allowGameCenter.title: Allow Game Center
allowGameCenter.description: If false, disables Game Center, and its icon is removed from the Home screen. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: true

allowCloudNotes.title: Allow Cloud Notes
allowCloudNotes.description: If false, disables iCloud Notes services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

allowiTunesFileSharing.title: Allow iTunes File Sharing
allowiTunesFileSharing.description: If false, disables iTunes file sharing services. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: true

safariAllowAutoFill.title: Safari Allow Auto Fill
safariAllowAutoFill.description: If false, disables Safari AutoFill for passwords, contact info, and credit cards and also prevents the Keychain from being used for AutoFill. Though third-party password managers are allowed and apps can use AutoFill. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: true

allowCloudDocumentSync.title: Allow Cloud Document Sync
allowCloudDocumentSync.description: If false, disables document and key-value syncing to iCloud. Available in macOS 10.11 and later. Default: true

forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates.title: Force Delayed App Software Updates
forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates.description: If true, delays user visibility of non-OS Software Updates. Requires a supervised device. Visibility of Operating System updates is controlled through forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates. The delay is 30 days unless enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay is set to another value. Available in macOS 11 and later. Default: false

allowPasswordProximityRequests.title: Allow Password Proximity Requests
allowPasswordProximityRequests.description: If false, disables requesting passwords from nearby devices. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.14 and later. Default: true

enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.title: Enforced Softwar eUpdate Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.description: Sets how many days to delay a software update on the device. With this restriction in place, the user doesn't see a software update until the specified number of days after the software update release date. This value is used by forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates and forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates. Available in macOS 10.13.4 and later.

allowCloudDesktopAndDocuments.title: Allow Cloud Desktop And Documents
allowCloudDesktopAndDocuments.description: If false, disables cloud desktop and document services. Available in macOS 10.12.4 and later. Default: true

allowPasswordAutoFill.title: Allow Password Auto Fill
allowPasswordAutoFill.description: If false, disables the AutoFill Passwords feature in iOS (with Keychain and third-party password managers) and the user isn't prompted to use a saved password in Safari or in apps. This restriction also disables Automatic Strong Passwords, and strong passwords are no longer suggested to users. It does not prevent AutoFill for contact info and credit cards in Safari. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.14 and later. Default: true

allowMusicService.title: Allow Music Service
allowMusicService.description: If false, disables the Music service, and the Music app reverts to classic mode. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

allowScreenShot.title: Allow Screen Shot
allowScreenShot.description: If false, disables saving a screenshot of the display and capturing a screen recording. It also disables the Classroom app from observing remote screens. Available in macOS 10.14.4 and later. Also available for user enrollment. Default: true

allowEraseContentAndSettings.title: Allow Erase Content And Settings
allowEraseContentAndSettings.description: If false, disables the Erase All Content And Settings option in the Reset UI. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 12 and later. Default: true

allowAddingGameCenterFriends.title: Allow Adding Game Center Friends
allowAddingGameCenterFriends.description: If false, prohibits adding friends to Game Center. As of iOS 13, requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: true

allowMultiplayerGaming.title: Allow Multiplayer Gaming
allowMultiplayerGaming.description: If false, prohibits multiplayer gaming. Requires a supervised device. Available in macOS 10.13 and later. Default: true

enforcedSoftwareUpdateMajorOSDeferredIns.title: Enforced Software Update Major OS Deferred Install Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateMajorOSDeferredIns.description: This restriction allows the admin to set how many days to delay a major software update on the device. When this restriction is in place the user sees a software update only after the specified delay after the release of the software update. This value controls the delay for forceDelayedMajorSoftwareUpdates. Available in macOS 11.3 and later.

allowAirPrint.title: Allow Air Print
allowAirPrint.description: If false, disables AirPrint.  Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later. Default: true

allowCloudBookmarks.title: Allow Cloud Bookmarks
allowCloudBookmarks.description: If false, disables iCloud Bookmark sync. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

allowCloudKeychainSync.title: Allow Cloud Keychain Sync
allowCloudKeychainSync.description: If false, disables iCloud keychain synchronization. This restriction is deprecated on unsupervised devices and will be supervised only in a future release. Available in macOS 10.12 and later. Default: true

forceDelayedMajorSoftwareUpdates.title: Force Delayed Major Software Updates
forceDelayedMajorSoftwareUpdates.description: If set to true, delays user visibility of major OS Software Updates. Available in macOS 11.3 and later. Default: false

allowCloudPrivateRelay.title: Allow Cloud Private Relay
allowCloudPrivateRelay.description: If false, disables iCloud Private Relay. Default: true
